body_html: from_numpy does nothing to the tensor data (as can be seen in the linked source). It's possible that the NumPy API we're using to implement the conversion is doing something very expensive under the hood, which would explain why the second case is fast. This is caused by the package implementing arr. Let me know if you can think of any improvements, but I don't think there's anything we can do here.

body: `from_numpy` does *nothing* to the tensor data (as can be seen in the linked source). It's possible that the NumPy API we're using to implement the conversion is doing something very expensive under the hood, which would explain why the second case is fast. This is caused by the package implementing `arr`. Let me know if you can think of any improvements, but I don't think there's anything we can do here.
